{
    "slug": "seo-toolkit",
    "label": "SEO Toolkit",
    "description":
      "Powerful tools for SEO professionals and marketers to optimize websites, improve rankings, and boost organic traffic. Includes keyword analysis, site audits, and more.",
    "image": "https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/5681/5681664.png",
    "metadata": {
      "title":
        "SEO Toolkit | Free Online SEO Tools for Website Optimization | ToolYour",
      "description":
        "Boost your website's SEO with ToolYour's free SEO Toolkit. Includes keyword density checker, link extractor, site audit, speed analyzer, and more for better rankings.",
      "keywords":
        "SEO toolkit, free SEO tools online, SEO optimization tools, keyword analysis tool, website audit tool, site speed analyzer, internal link checker, social media SEO, ToolYour SEO tools"
    }
  }

{
        "categoryId":"68a194965cb4f42b058d14c1",
        "slug": "keyword-checker",
        "name": "Keyword Density Checker",
        "description":
          "Analyze keyword usage on any webpage. Check keyword density and frequency to optimize your content for SEO while avoiding keyword stuffing. Ensure natural language use for better rankings.", 
        "image":
          "https://png.pngtree.com/png-vector/20230507/ourmid/pngtree-keyword-vector-png-image_6742063.png",
        "metadata": {
          "title":
            "Free Keyword Density Checker | Analyze On-Page Keywords | ToolYour", 
          "description":
            "Check keyword density for free with our analyzer tool. Optimize your on-page SEO by analyzing keyword frequency on any URL. Avoid keyword stuffing and improve content relevance. Try ToolYour's checker now!",
          "keywords":
            "keyword density checker, on-page keyword analyzer, check keyword frequency, website keyword analysis, free keyword density tool, content optimization tool, SEO analysis tool, on-page SEO checker, find keywords on page, avoid keyword stuffing, content analysis tool, toolyour"
        }
      }
